idinfo.native: Microsoft Windows Vista Version 6.1 (Build 7601) Service Pack 1; ESRI ArcCatalog 9.3.1.4000

descript.abstract: This polygon dataset represents zones for elementary schools for New York City.
descript.purpose: This dataset is intended for researchers, students, and policy makers for reference and mapping purposes, and may be used for basic applications such as viewing, querying, and map output production, or to provide a basemap to support graphical overlays and analysis with other spatial data.

citeinfo.origin: New York (N.Y.). Department of Information Technology and Telecommunications
citeinfo.title: Elementary School Zones New York City 2011- 2012

citeinfo.origin: New York (N.Y.). Department of Information Technology and Telecommunications
citeinfo.title: DoITT data

pubinfo.publish: New York (N.Y.). Department of Information Technology and Telecommunications
New York (N.Y.). Department of Information Technology and Telecommunications

cntorgp.cntorg: New York City Department of Information Technology & Telecommunications

dataIdInfo.envirDesc: Microsoft Windows Vista Version 6.1 (Build 7601) Service Pack 1; ESRI ArcCatalog 9.3.1.4000
dataIdInfo.idPurp: Elementary School Zoning information was transcribed into GIS to enable spatial analysis and web communication efforts. This data is for reference purposes only. Questions or concerns about this data should be forwared to the NYC Department of Education Office of Enrollment 212-374-5426 or 311.
dataIdInfo.idAbs: <DIV STYLE="text-align:Left;"><DIV><DIV><P><SPAN>Polygons defining zones for Elementary Schools for New York City.</SPAN></P></DIV></DIV></DIV>
dataIdInfo.idCredit: NYC Department of Education, Portfolio Planning Division

idPoC.rpOrgName: New York City Department of Education

resMaint.maintNote: Scheduled for update annually. Additional updates if provided for error correction or informational update.

Consts.useLimit: Data is intended for reference only. Questions or inconsistencies should be brought to Enrollment by calling 212-374-5426 or 311

metainfo.metstdn: FGDC Content Standards for Digital Geospatial Metadata

altsys.altenc: Explicit elevation coordinate included with horizontal coordinates

attrdomv.udom: Sequential unique whole numbers that are automatically generated.

attr.attrdef: NYC School District that the poygon falls in.
Internal code used to reference all schools associated with the zone
Borough that the polygon resides in.

attrvai.attrva: Data has not always been correctly updated and may not reflect most recent activity to the polygon

attr.attrdef: Original date of definition for the polygon.

attrvai.attrva: Data has not always been correctly updated and may not reflect most recent activity to the polygon

attr.attrdef: Text description to assist in understanding the zone data for the polygon.
Date polygon was most recently edited

attrvai.attrva: Data has not always been correctly updated and may not reflect most recent activity to the polygon

attr.attrdef: School cistrict of the listed zoned schools.
District Borough and School Number of the zoned schools in a comma delimited text list
Length of the feature measured in the unit of meter.
Area of feature measured in the unit of square meters.

attrdomv.udom: Positive real numbers that are automatically generated.

procstep.procdesc: Changed name of file from NYC_ElementarySchool_Zones_2011_2012A to NYCElementarySchoolZones1112

attracc.attraccr: Attribute information remains the same as given by the author of the data. However, when information is missing or ambiguous, the GIS Information Systems Center at Tufts University researches other metadata sources for explanations. If sufficient information is unavailable, "unknown attribute" is given as the definition. If the attribute has been created through a geoprocessing function, "geoprocessed identifier" is given. If the attribute is known, but the values are not, "unknown" is given for values. Features' units of measurement are determined if not already given.

mdMaint.maintNote: Scheduled for update annually. Additional updates if provided for error correction or informational update.

Consts.useLimit: Data is intended for reference only. Questions or inconsistencies should be brought to Enrollment by calling 212-374-5426 or 311

dqReport.measDesc: Data is valid for the NYC School Year of 2011-2012

dataLineage.statement: Derived from data representing the 2010-2011 School Year
